morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does (similar to Active)
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action is desired or expected
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person speaking or writing
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that hopefully happens - by a person or thing that is speaking or writing
